Just 3 years old, this 1st floor apartment is set in a boutique development that will appeal to occupiers and investors alike. This development defines low maintenance living just minutes away from central Dandenong and its shops, cafes, trains and market. This street front apartment features an open living/dining area with floating floors and split system heater/air conditioner plus a kitchen with stone benches, glass tiled splash backs and stainless appliances. Description:
Premier parkside living
Backing onto scenic parkland at the rear of a block of only two, this sparkling single-level brick veneer unit delivers the space you need on a manageable scale.
Its peaceful parkside location provides the perfect environment for raising a young family, as does the generously proportioned interior featuring three carpeted bedrooms (master with walk-in robe and stylish ensuite), radiant open-plan living and a luxurious fully-tiled family bathroom.
Excellent tiled flooring throughout the open-plan living and kitchen area ensures longevity, while a generous collection of skylights flood the interior with an abundance of natural light.
Size, space and quality extends to the deluxe kitchen, which enjoys the benefits of a large U-shaped benchtop with breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances, while a peaceful low-maintenance courtyard, separate laundry, contemporary Venetian blinds, split-system cooling, ducted heating throughout and a single lock-up garage enhance the appeal of this great first home, downsizing option or investment.
Having such easy access to the Eastlink Trail allows you to enjoy weekend bike rides on your own or with the kids, while walking distance access to Yarraman train station (Noble Park) and Dandenong West Primary School along with the close proximity of Eastlink, Dandenong Plaza and Greaves Reserve are further highlights.
